description: Complete system overview detailing the DAW architecture, core components, and their interactions within the audio processing pipeline
Detailed documentation of the core audio processing algorithms, including the Harmonic Lattice system, Native Velvet Curve processing, and real-time analysis implementations
Comprehensive documentation of the AI mixing assistant system, including the cultural-context awareness engine, Prime Brain Core functionality, and mixing recommendation algorithms
Technical specification of the Advanced Leveling System (ALS), including multi-parameter monitoring, frequency band analysis, and real-time visualization data flow
Detailed documentation of data flow between major components, including audio bridge interactions, context sharing, and state management between UI and processing layers
